website_summaries.verdict: This adjustable strap with reinforced ends comes with pouch for phone and keys.
pros: Strong, thick canvas material doesn't stretch out
Comes with a phone and keys pouch that clips on strap
Dedicated loops for each end of the strap
cons: May be a little too long for shorter people

customer_reviews.title: So much better than trying to stuff your yoga mat in a bag
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited go get this mat strap that I bought two. One for me and one for my son. We both needed something to transport our mats easier, but I really didn't want another netted bag like I had before. It was always an extra work out to stuff that bad boy in there. So this strap is perfect. It slides right on both sides and adjusts seamlessly. My son's mat is slightly bigger than mine and it fits his perfect too. Plus you cannot beat the small purse that comes with it to hold your phone and essentials. D rings right to the strap and is manly enough for you guys. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: April Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: In lieu of a bag for a camp chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to tote my chair after losing the bag it came with. I never liked the bags anyway and was looking for a strap type item to cinch the chair in and be able to hold over my shoulder. This works perfectly. I'll never fumble with bags again!
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Love this strap and the pouch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap and the pouch! Due to being short, 5'2, I have a hard time finding straps that hold my mat well and fits my height. I was nervous because the price was so reasonable, but this is my favorite strap I have ever owned. Also, my iPhone 8 plus fits tightly in the pouch due to a thick case, but I can still sip it up and attach my key with the clip. It is perfect for a daily yoga practicer like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga mat strap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap for both myself and my brother in law. My brother in law is a HUGE yoga person and is always taking classes. It was no brainer that he needed something that would hold his mat and free up his hands while traveling to classes. Can't wait to give it as part of his Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Anay Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. I use this to go around poster tubes at concerts so I don't have to hold on to the tube with my hands for the whole show or risk it getting damaged by putting it on the ground..
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't dig into my shoulder & allows me to transport my mat easily and comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable strap fits my yoga mat perfectly. It doesn't dig into my shoulder & allows me to transport my mat easily and comfortably. The pouch that comes with it is a nice added benefit, and holds my phone, keys, and a few extras. My one suggestion though, is why charge different prices for different colors?!
customer_reviews.author: Gena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga mat strap
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect yoga mat strap. It is adjustable, sturdy and affordable. The pouch is a bonus. It holds my driver’s license, phone & keys, which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Bonkay

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat strap. It’s as good of quality as the expensive ones plus it comes with a little carrying case. Inside the case it has netting and a zipper pocket! I use it to bring my lavender spray into class so my mat smells good during hot yoga. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy product. I bought a second one after getting the first for a friend. The pouch is a nice touch. Great for a smaller studio I go to that asks you to leave your bag outside. Perfect to keep just your keys and phone in so you don’t need a bag. Price point for the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: keisharose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap.. and no directions. Did not come exactly as shown in photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price the durability of the strap. I use it for my yoga mat
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Strap too small
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra long (6 ft). extra thick mat and this strap did not fit around the rolled up mat
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Durability and Versatility
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to use the Heath-yoga Mat Strap on a particular brand of yoga-mat , the strap broke. The mat was thicker, that a average yoga mat, the strap was unable to fit around this type.
customer_reviews.author: Indera

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love the strap. Easy to use, cinches and uncinches quickly. Came very quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Avid

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying travel mat and keeping phone close and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Th strap is great. Goes on and off quickly but holds mat really well. And it fits a wide variety of mat sizes when rolled. The phone case is great during hot yoga. I keep it in the room with me. I could detect a slight vibration if anyone needs to reach me but isn’t distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great strap plus phone case.
customer_reviews.text: Great strap! Adjusts enough to fit my mat and 2 Mexican blankets... I just throw it over my shoulder and I’m ready to go. The addition of the clip on phone case / wallet made this a great value as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good strap
customer_reviews.text: Great product that did exactly what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product.
customer_reviews.text: The strap is easy to use. The quality exceeded my expectations. The materials and craftsmanship have me convinced that this will last far beyond the life of my yoga mat. The strap can also double as a stretching aid.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s light weight and the pouch is perfect for carrying a cleansing spray
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy strap--I use two yoga mats, both thick, and the strap, with adjustable loops, holds both together nicely. Makes it easy to carry the mats securely.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for the price, I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and I love the phone & key holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It a very sturdy and easy to use strap at a great price .
customer_reviews.author: Mee Shar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very useful
customer_reviews.text: This strap is great as it acts both as a carrying strap but also as a yoga strap and can assist with the exercise. The pouch is just a bonus. I am very satisfied with this purchase and I would recommend it. It is high quality, lightweight, durable and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and the bag for my key and ...
customer_reviews.text: These items met my expectation. Easy to adjust and the bag for my key and phone is great! Highly recommend 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ramsquared2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved that I won’t have to worry about strap stretching out.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Durable and convenient to use. I like that it is adjustable because one of them was for my 3 year old niece!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: The strap is strong and sturdy! And i love the convenient pouch it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap is strong and sturdy! And i love the convenient pouch it comes with-perfect for going to yoga class :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Strap worked great on my 72 inch yoga mat. Case that came with it was a nice little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it should do and the little bag is a nice plus!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it should do and the little bag is a nice plus!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Palladino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Health Yoga products. The mat strap is a perfect addition to my Health Yoga mat and towel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Goyette

customer_reviews.title: I love the mat
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat, it really helps my knees, along with the pouch that holds my phone, earphones & a clip for my keys. Very convienient!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: strap sling tough
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mat!! The Strap Sling was a little bit hard to figure out. I kept look at picture and thought it was supposed to work in the way it did. I just had to try a few times to get sling open. It worked great, after figured out how to open!! The pocket holder was too small to fit my huge Apple 7+
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F-R

customer_reviews.title: This strap is easy to use and the pocket bag for phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: This strap is easy to use and the pocket bag for phone and keys is perfect! Love it because I can wrap my knee pad around my matt and the strap fits around both of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
